things.thing
Interface BASEInterface

All Known Subinterfaces:
MODULEInterface, THINGInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
BASE, MODULE, PropertyUniverseActor, THING
public interface BASEInterface

A base interface.
This can allow non-MODULE/THING objects access to a MODULE/THING's services.

Version:
1.0

Version History 

EPG - Initial - 26 FEB 07
Author:
Erich P. Gatejen

Method Summary
 Logger GET_LOGGER()
          Get the MODULE's Logger.
 

Method Detail

GET_LOGGER

Logger GET_LOGGER()
                  throws UserException
Get the MODULE's Logger. Do not use this for any result data.

Returns:
a logger
Throws:
UserException
See Also:
Logger
